channel.title: HUGE MATRIX GLITCH [Player gets Admin]
channel.description:
Today, Someone said, why didn't i receive my donator, i donated 40$??! I replied, to who did you donate? He said to 'Elite'. (Me and my friend are the only owners) He said he had a crown. I didn't believe him, later that day, someone named Elite joined my server, he had a Blue Partyhat and a firecape, on a eco server, but wait.. he was a Admin!? WHAT??? Yes, he got admin on a unknown way, he claimed to be Dragonkk, and he was the one scamming the guy who donated 40$,
FOR PEOPLE WHO DON'T LIKE TO READ: ~Someone claimed he donated 40$ to Elite (a admin who i don't know), but didn't get his donor rank. ~Later that day i saw him on my Server ~He claimed to be Dragonkk, he is also a admin on my server. (Not anymore tough)
Basicly my question is, there is a glitch that makes a play er a admin, a command or something, i checked at commands.java, didn't find anything, but ok. He left.
Did someone find the glitch? Could it be client sided?
Thanks, Impactz Venux

item.title: HUGE MATRIX GLITCH [Player gets Admin]
item.dc:creator: @Impactz Impactz
item.description:
@Impactz wrote:

[quote=“RyRyscape, post:2, topic:460883”]Maybe cause that name is in the file

if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Elite”)) {
c2.sendMessage("<shad=9440238>[Global Mod]<img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");

If the name is still in there ^^^^ he gets powers. Know what I mean :P? This is an example of why he would get powers. Never looked at matrix so dont know if format would be the same.[/quote]

Err… can’t find his name anywhere :s

Read full topic

item.title: HUGE MATRIX GLITCH [Player gets Admin]
item.dc:creator: @RyRyscape RyRyscape
item.description:
@RyRyscape wrote:

Maybe cause that name is in the file

if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Elite”)) {
c2.sendMessage("<shad=9440238>[Global Mod]<img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");

If the name is still in there ^^^^ he gets powers. Know what I mean :P? This is an example of why he would get powers. Never looked at matrix so dont know if format would be the same.

Read full topic
